snippet.title: Official 15 Minutes Gameplay Showcase - Dark Souls: Archthrones
snippet.description:
Download the Demo from NexusMods:

https://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls3/mods/1765

Enjoyed the Demo? Please Consider supporting us: 

www.Ko-fi.com/Archthrones

www.Patreon.com/Archthrones

We hope you're excited as we are! 

VIDEO CONTENT CREDITS:

SCRIPTING:
Enemy Scripting: Cyanic, Bazyleeshek, MintedCopper
Event Scripting: Gomp, Cyanic, Bazyleeshek, AronTheBaron
NPC Scripting: Gomp
Player Scripting: Freemathieuroy, The12thAvenger

ANIMATION:
Animation Editing: Cyanic, AronTheBaron Bazyleeshek, Gomp
Animation Retargeting: Big Boss, FreeMathiueuroy, Clevererraptor6

VISUALS:
Models: Spoongus, AronTheBaron, Dakeshi, Athelwulf
Map Design and Visuals: AronTheBaron
Visual Effects:  AronTheBaron, Rayan, Bazyleeshek
HUD: Joel, Niel_fssq
Core of the Wall Guardian Icon: ArtNobuddy
Concept Art: ArtNobuddy

AUDIO:
Angelic Wall Guardian Music: project_zy
Ambient Music and Sounds: project_zy
Nexus of Embers Music: Alex Roe (Remnants Call)
Disgraced Knight Music: Alex Roe (Locryn, Keeper of the Void)
Audio Implementation: Gomp, Freemathieuroy, AronTheBaron

VOICES:
Fire Keeper: MariaGriffinVA

DIALOGUE:
ArtNobuddy, Brogan, Gomp

OTHER:
Bloodborne Enemy Porting: Kez, Gomp
Sekiro Enemy Porting: Gomp, Big Boss, FreeMathiueuroy
New Ragdoll: The12thAvenger
New Cloth: The12thAvenger, Freemathieuroy
Cutscene Editing: Gomp

VIDEO RECORDING: 
Mintedcopper, FreeMathiueuroy, Bazyleeshek and VoiceIntheRadio

VIDEO EDITING:
AronTheBaron

THUMBNAIL:
SkallEdit

Timestamps:
0:00 Intro
0:10 Rainswept Outpost
1:30 Demon Vanguard
2:25 Nexus of Embers
3:30 Archthrone of the Old Gods
6:22 Disgraced Knight
9:48 Interlude
10:10 Archthrone of the Bountiful Queen
11:47 Angelic Wall Guardian
14:48 Outro

#darksouls3 #archthrones
